= CMSS configuration =

=== set up Solr config and schemas ===

Alter solrconfig.xml ro reflect the following: 

{{{
<requestHandler name="standard" class="solr.SearchHandler" default="true">
    <!-- default values for query parameters -->
     <lst name="defaults">
       <str name="echoParams">all</str>
       <str name="wt">xslt</str>
       <str name="tr">cmss.xsl</str>
       <int name="rows">10</int>
       <!--
       <str name="fl">*</str>
       <str name="version">2.1</str>
        -->
     </lst>
  </requestHandler>
}}}

Where cmss.xsl is the custom xslt form, located in conf/xslt/
